title: Flipkart PLA Consolidated FSN Seller Portal Daily Report
description: Daily consolidated performance report for Flipkart PLA Campaign with FSN on Seller Portal

Campaign_ID.description: Unique identifier for the campaign, e.g., 'O0UIUOOHM1U2'

Campaign_Name.description: Name of the campaign, e.g., 'Kadhai Oct'

AdGroup_ID.description: Unique identifier for the ad group, e.g., 'QJC0ZTFEOXEF'

AdGroup_Name.description: Name of the ad group, e.g., 'Kitchen, Cookware & Serveware'

Product_Name.description: Name of the product, e.g., 'Stahl Triply Stainless Steel Artisan Hybrid 6320, 20cm, 1.6 Liters Kadhai 20 cm diameter with Lid 1.6 L capacity'

Views.description: Number of views for the product

Clicks.description: Number of clicks for the product

Units_Sold_Direct.description: Number of units sold through direct sales

Units_Sold_Indirect.description: Number of units sold through indirect sales

ROI.description: Return on investment for the product

Date.description: Date of the report in the format 'DD-MM-YYYY', e.g., '08-11-2023'
